meta.project: B2B Fashion SaaS — Image-to-Video Catalogue + Trend Analyzer

product_overview: A premium B2B SaaS platform designed for fashion retailers and bulk buyers to upload dress images and instantly receive AI-generated photorealistic 3D model stills, product clips, and runway videos, coupled with real-time trend analytics to enable market validation and informed buying decisions.
core_goals: Reduce cost and lead time of physical fashion photoshoots via AI-generated imagery and videos.
Provide actionable, real-time trend insights across demographics, seasons, and regions for data-driven inventory and purchase decisions.
Enable bulk catalogue generation with easy upload, job tracking, and export capabilities.
Support diverse model presets including body diversity, gender mix, and style tags to ensure inclusive and customizable catalogues.
Deliver a user-friendly responsive interface optimized for desktop and mobile users with accessible design.
Ensure scalable, secure, and compliant backend processing with robust job queuing, caching, and data privacy measures.
key_features: Image Upload & Catalogue Generator with drag-and-drop, batch support, resumable uploads, and preset selection for model diversity and output types (stills, clips, runway videos).
Job tracking and progress monitoring with detailed stages and ETA for catalogue generation jobs.
Preview interface featuring multi-angle playback, metadata badges (market appeal, style compatibility, body diversity), and bulk export (ZIP + CSV/JSON metadata).
Trend Analyzer Dashboard presenting trending dress types with demographic and regional filters, dynamic charts, predictive insights, and watchlist alerts.
Robust backend architecture with Express API platform, Bull queue workers for AI video generation, Redis caching, PostgreSQL storage, and third-party AI and trend APIs integration.
Role-based access control with audit logging, GDPR/CCPA compliance, secure uploads with malware scanning, and private object storage with signed URLs.
Responsive global navigation featuring persistent sidebar on desktop, bottom tab bar on mobile, and quick access to key functionalities.
user_flow_summary: Quick Catalogue Generation: User uploads single image → selects model presets and output package → submits job → monitors progress → previews and exports results.
Bulk Catalogue Creation: User batch uploads multiple images (10-200) → triggers queued processing jobs → tracks job status → exports bulk ZIP package including metadata.

Trend Analysis Exploration: User accesses Trend Analyzer → applies filters by season, age group, region, and category → reviews detailed trend insights and forecasts → pins trends to watchlist and sets alert notifications.
Purchase Decision Workflow: Uses generated visual assets combined with trend scores to shortlist products → shares selections with procurement and other stakeholders.
Export & Integration: Bulk export of catalogue assets including images, videos, and metadata in structured ZIP files; partner API access for programmatic retrieval with signed URL rotation.
validation_criteria: Successful upload of dress images with client-side validation and support for multiple formats and large files.
Accurate and timely job processing with visible progress stages and ETA on catalogue generation.
Generation of high-quality photorealistic images and videos meeting preset configurations and style specifications.
Trend Analyzer providing up-to-date, cached data with predictive analytics and user-customized filters working correctly.
Responsive and accessible UI/UX across devices with smooth navigation and error handling.
System scalability under load with effective caching, rate limiting, and autoscaling of job workers.
Security compliance including role-based access, data privacy, malware scanning, and signed URLs for asset delivery.
Robust error handling for upload failures, generation timeouts, missing data, network issues, and duplicate requests.

features.name: Express API Platform
features.description: Bootstraps the Express server with CORS, health checks, error handling, and shared middleware around the REST entry points.

features.name: Catalogue Upload & Job Tracking
features.description: Accepts dress image uploads, validates payloads, and exposes endpoints to create catalogue jobs, poll status, download items, and manage user history.

features.name: Video Generation Orchestration
features.description: Runs Bull queue workers that call AI generation services, persist produced media, update progress, and surface public download paths.

features.name: Trend Analytics & Caching
features.description: Validates trend filters, fetches analytics from an external client, and caches summarized datasets for faster repeat queries.

features.name: Data Infrastructure & Utilities
features.description: Initializes PostgreSQL connections, performs migrations, prepares upload directories, and offers filesystem helpers shared across services.

features.name: Catalogue Generator Experience
features.description: Frontend flow for uploading images, triggering generation, and presenting catalogue results with filtering and download actions.

features.name: Trend Analyzer Dashboard
features.description: Interactive analytics view with demographic filters, cached API access, and chart visualizations of trend metrics.

features.name: Product Preview Interface
features.description: Marketing-oriented preview page and shared layout components that showcase the AI catalogue and trend features.
